channel.title: Comments on: Changing a SQL Server Database Owner
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: ergoface
item.dc:creator: ergoface
item.description: Just wanted to say thank you for this tip. It helped me create a script to mass change the ownership of databases on several servers.
item.content:encoded: Just wanted to say thank you for this tip. It helped me create a script to mass change the ownership of databases on several servers.

item.title: By: Naomi Nosonovsky
item.dc:creator: Naomi Nosonovsky
item.description: Very nice, thanks a lot for sharing this info.
item.content:encoded: Very nice, thanks a lot for sharing this info.

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.description: Old habits die hard...I am still using sp_who2, DBCC commands everyday for things that I could do with a Dynamic Management View
item.content:encoded: Old habits die hard…I am still using sp_who2, DBCC commands everyday for things that I could do with a Dynamic Management View
